title: Southeast Asia’s largest bank enters the Metaverse
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Singapore-based banking group DBS, Southeast Asia’s largest lender by assets, has teamed up with The Sandbox, a blockchain-based Metaverse gaming platform, to develop new services for customers in the three-dimensional virtual environment which includes digital avatars. The Sandbox, a division

The post Southeast Asia’s largest bank enters the Metaverse appeared first on Investvine.
